For their mother <S%H517><s%> has played the prostitute. <S%H2181><s%> She who conceived <S%H2029><s%> them has done shamefully; <S%H3001><s%> for she said, <S%H559><s%> <S%H3212><s%> 'I will go after <S%H310><s%> my lovers, <S%H157><s%> who give <S%H5414><s%> me my bread <S%H3899><s%> and my water, <S%H4325><s%> my wool <S%H6785><s%> and my flax, <S%H6593><s%> my oil <S%H8081><s%> and my drink. <S%H8250><s%>'
